query.qrawl: select distinct title, count(*) from authors group by title
select distinct title, count(*) from authors group by title
select distinct title, * from authors group by title
select distinct title, (select year from *) from authors group by title
select distinct title, (select year from *) from authors group by title
select distinct title, (select year from partition) from authors group by title
select distinct title, (select distinct year, count(partition) from partition group by year) from authors group by title
select distinct title, (select distinct year, partition from partition group by year) from authors group by title
